text.tspan: Press z on your keyboard or button #1 on your gamepad to shoot.
Destroy the enemy.
Press the arrows on your keyboard or the dpad or analog on your gamepad to move.
Destroy the enemy.
Stop shooting to charge, shoot to unleash an attack that cleans enemy bullets in it's way.
Destroy 150 enemy bullets.
Press the shoot button right before getting hit to parry.
Parry 3 consecutive enemy bullets.
After parrying, keep pressed the shoot button for a shot invulnerability time and speed boost.
Destroy 15 enemy bullets using the parry dash.
Congratulations!
Remember, you can deal more damage by getting closer to the enemy.
Press the shoot button to continue.
Congratulations!
Remember, on impact, the player activates a shield that lowers the next hits damage
Press the shoot button to continue.
Congratulations!
Press the shoot button to continue.
Congratulations!
Remember, you can parry up 3 times per round
Press the shoot button to continue.
Congratulations!
Press the shoot button to continue.
